name: Draugen Original Soundtrack
summary:
The original soundtrack to Draugen contains 25 tracks and over one hour of music composed by Simon Poole, the award-winning audio director and composer behind Dreamfall and Dreamfall Chapters, The Secret World, The Park, and My Child Lebensborn. 

Credits
Madeleine Ossum - Violin
Emilie Heldal Lidsheim - Viola
Ingvild Nesdal Sandnes - Cello
Ingvild Hasund - Vocals
Jorunn Torsheim - Vocals
Torunn Østrem Ossum - Vocals
Julie Ofelia Østrem Ossum - Vocals
Simon Poole - Piano and additional instruments

Music recorded at Propeller Music Division, Oslo
Mixed by Rich Aitken at Nimrod Sound
Mastered by Chris Sansom at Propeller Mastering
